/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, Table, FormGroup, Input } from "reactstrap"; class Vault extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", individualCP: "", } } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { if (this.props.individualCPs.length > 0) { this.props.individualCPs[0][0].then( console.log ); } return ( <>
{this.props.indexCP} Collateral Positions
ID Tokens Collateral Liquidation rate
TEST - 1 0,00 0,00 300%
TEST - 2 0,00 0,00 300%
Create Collateral Position
{" "} USD Token amount Collateral details
Collateral amount Liquidation price Current Rate
0,00 0,00 200,00
); } } export default Vault;
